subject: RE: [junit] Logging Messages
msgSnippet: Google Log4Unit.  It s also available via the junit.org extensions page. As for logging to the ResultPrinter s PrintStream, go ahead: it s AKA System.out. ;-
messageBody:
Google Log4Unit. It's also available via the junit.org extensions page.

As for logging to the ResultPrinter's PrintStream, go ahead: it's AKA System.out. ;->

Scott Stirling


-----Original Message-----
From: lukatmyshu [mailto:vijay.raghunathan@...]



Within the TestRunner object there is a PrintStream (enveloped by the
ResultPrinter object). I'd like to be able to pass messages to this
stream, some sort of log. Is there any way to do this? Or is this
so against the JUnit philosophy that it is not allowed.
